Title: All for Free
Actors: Rakan Rushaidat, Bojan Navojec, Franjo Dijak, Enis Beslagic
Plot: Goran is 30, living in a small Bosnian town. Unlike his friends, whose lives have been seriously altered by war (his best friend Miro lost both his arms in the war), Goran got away from it ...
Country: Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia and Montenegro, Croatia
